about_the_game:
Prologue.

The country of Erylmia, the Land of the Blooming Dead...

Compared to other countries, it had achieved remarkable development and was one of the world's leading nations in terms of both land area and technological capabilities.

The driving force behind this development was the legacy of the prehistoric civilisation period (archive) ‘Ask Gear’.

This device, which released the latent potential of those who held it in their hands and gave them power and wisdom, had the potential to transform ordinary men into heroes.

The power of the limited number of people who could activate the Ask Gear, known as the Connectors, enabled Erylmia to achieve great development.

In the year 790, Yua Ricoeur, a young wanderer (Vint), a man who walks the path of the powerless and relies only on himself, is travelling through Ellirmia with Memoria Oblivion, a woman with an Ask Gear in her hand.

The purpose of their journey was to recover something precious that had been lost.

In the course of their journey, they discover two unknowns in the unexplored ruins.

One is the Ask Gear. The other is a girl asleep in her cradle.

--The story is about losing something precious in order to regain something precious that has been lost.

Game introduction

■ What is Reboost?

This is a large-scale upgraded version of the doujin RPG Ask Gear, released by Inaho Studio in 2017.

While maintaining the bare-bones storyline and system that made it a self-confessed straightforward RPG, the game has undergone a major overhaul across the entire game, with improved resolution, balance adjustments, new events, new systems and new visuals.

Usability has also been greatly improved with the addition of fast travel, making this the definitive version that is both a boost and a reboot.

■ Battle system

Command input type battles in which players act from the character whose action values have been accumulated.

The game design combines a fast-paced, speedy and deep system, allowing players to enjoy a variety of strategies.

■ Hot scenarios

The scenario that received a good reputation is still alive and well in Reboost.

In addition, several additional events have been added.

You can enter the world of Ask Gear even more deeply.

■ New visuals

New visuals have been implemented for the main characters!

The visual aspect has also been greatly enhanced.
